metadata.title: CVE-2024-0126 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerabilitywhich could allow a privileged attacker to escalate permissions. Asuccessful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to code execution,denial of service, escalation of privileges, information disclosure, anddata tampering.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0126` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnvidia-cfg1-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
libnvidia-common-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
libnvidia-compute-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
libnvidia-decode-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
libnvidia-encode-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
libnvidia-extra-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
libnvidia-fbc1-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
libnvidia-gl-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-compute-utils-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-dkms-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-dkms-535-server-open - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-driver-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-driver-535-server-open - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-firmware-535-server-535.216.01 - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-headless-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-headless-535-server-open - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-headless-no-dkms-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-headless-no-dkms-535-server-open - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-kernel-common-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-kernel-source-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-kernel-source-535-server-open - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
nvidia-utils-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
xserver-xorg-video-nvidia-535-server - 535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-535 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-535-server package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '535.216.01-0ubuntu0.24.10.2').
